description: This file provides a utility function to trigger a file download from a URL in a browser environment by dynamically creating and clicking an anchor element.

methods.name: export function downloadFromUrl(url: string, filename?: string): boolean { downloadFromUrl
methods.description: Initiates a download of a file from a specified URL, optionally using a given filename. Creates a temporary anchor element, triggers click, then removes it.

ctags.name: downloadFromUrl
ctags.pattern: /^export function downloadFromUrl(url: string, filename?: string): boolean {$/
